messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 5032
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/16/2004 6:40:39 PM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: Anyone  here who doubts that should order some
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/16/2004 6:40:39 PM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

Anyone here who doubts that should order some back issues of Home School
Digest or The Old Schoolhouse. They WANT their children separate, they
WANT them
to think that everything outside their protected little world is the
imminent
destruction by and of Satan and that the children's only salvation is
isolation.<<<<<<

Or you can come visit me for a few weeks. There are lots of homeschoolers
here that won't let their children play with mine.
Pam G





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
